eu.ehri.extension

Class GenericResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ehri.extension.base.AbstractResource
      • eu.ehri.extension.base.AbstractAccessibleResource<Accessible>
        • eu.ehri.extension.GenericResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TxCheckedResource

    public class GenericResource
extends AbstractAccessibleResource<Accessible>
    Provides a means of fetching items and lists of items regardless of their specific type.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class eu.ehri.extension.base.AbstractAccessibleResource

    • Method Detail

      • list

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response list(List<String> ids,
                                      List<Long> gids)
        Fetch a list of items by their ID. Note: if both global IDs and graph IDs (GIDs) are given as query parameters, GIDs will be returned at the head of the response list.
        Parameters:
        ids - a list of string IDs
        gids - a list of graph number IDs
        Returns:
        A serialized list of items, with nulls for items that are not found or inaccessible.

      • listFromJson

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response listFromJson(String json)
                                       throws ItemNotFound,
                                              PermissionDenied,
                                              DeserializationError,
                                              IOException
        Fetch a list of items by their ID. Note: if both global IDs and graph IDs (GIDs) are given as query parameters, GIDs will be returned at the head of the response list.
        Parameters:
        json - a JSON-encoded list of IDs, which can consist of either strings or (if a number) graph (long) ids.
        Returns:
        A serialized list of items, with nulls for items that are not found or inaccessible.
        Throws:
        ItemNotFound
        PermissionDenied
        DeserializationError
        IOException

                                               SerializationError
        Set the accessors who are able to view an item. If no accessors are set, the item is globally readable.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the item
        accessorIds - the IDs of the users who can access this item.
        Returns:
        the updated object
        Throws:
        PermissionDenied
